Jx.Form

Extends: Jx.Widget

A class that represents an HTML form.  You add fields using either Jx.Form.add() or by using the field’s .addTo() method.  You can get all form values or set them using this class.  It also handles validation of fields through the use of a plugin (Jx.Plugin.Form.Validator).

Jx.Form has the ability to submit itself via normal HTTP submit as well as via AJAX.  To submit normally you simply call the submit() function.  To submit by AJAX, call ajaxSubmit().  If the form contains Jx.Field.File instances it will either submit all of the files individually and then the data, or it will submit data with the last File instance it finds.  This behavior is dependant on the uploadFilesFirst option (which defaults to false).

Example

Summary
Jx.FormExtends: Jx.Widget
Options
methodthe method used to submit the form
actionwhere to submit it to
fileUploadwhether this form handles file uploads or not.
formClass
namethe name property for the form
acceptCharsetthe character encoding to be used. 
uploadFilesFirstWhether to upload all of the files in the form before uploading the rest of the form. 
Functions
renderConstructs the form but does not add it to anything to be shown. 
addFieldAdds a Jx.Field subclass to this form’s fields hash
getValuesGets the values of all the fields in the form as a Hash object. 
setValuesUsed to set values on the form
addPass as many parameters as you like. 
resetResets all fields back to their original value
getFieldsByNameAllows retrieving a field from a form by the name of the field (NOT the ID).
getFieldReturns a Jx.Field object by its ID.
setBusySets the busy state of the Form and all of it’s fields.



Options



method
the method used to submit the form



action
where to submit it to



fileUpload
whether this form handles file uploads or not.



formClass



name
the name property for the form



acceptCharset
the character encoding to be used.  Defaults to utf-8.



uploadFilesFirst
Whether to upload all of the files in the form before uploading the rest of the form.  If set to false the form will upload the data with the last file that it finds,



Functions



render
render : function ()
Constructs the form but does not add it to anything to be shown.  The caller should use form.addTo() to add the form to the DOM.



addField
addField : function (field)
Adds a Jx.Field subclass to this form’s fields hash
Parameters
fieldJx.Field to add



getValues
getValues : function (asQueryString)
Gets the values of all the fields in the form as a Hash object.  This uses the mootools function Element.toQueryString to get the values and will either return the values as a querystring or as an object (using mootools-more’s String.parseQueryString method).
Parameters
asQueryString{boolean} indicates whether to return the value as a query string or an object.



setValues
setValues : function (values)
Used to set values on the form
Parameters
valuesA Hash of values to set keyed by field name.



add
add : function ()
Parameters
Pass as many parameters as you like.  However, they should all be Jx.Field objects or objects that can be processed by document.id().



reset
reset : function ()
Resets all fields back to their original value



getFieldsByName
getFieldsByName: function (name)
Allows retrieving a field from a form by the name of the field (NOT the ID).
Parameters
name{string} the name of the field to find



getField
getField: function (id)
Returns a Jx.Field object by its ID.
Parameters
id{string} the id of the field to find.



setBusy
setBusy: function(state)
Sets the busy state of the Form and all of it’s fields.
Parameters
state{boolean} indicated whether the form is busy or not.









Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework.

Constructs the form but does not add it to anything to be shown.
